sentences.en: ...the hiss of water running into the burned pan.
sentences.cn: …水流进烧红的煎锅时的嘶嘶声。

sentences.en: " Well , I've met him before, but I never thought Hiss Su would go for him.
sentences.cn: “ 我倒看见过这人, 可是我想不到苏小姐会看中他.

sentences.en: " You can hiss all you like,'said Jou - chia.
sentences.cn: 柔嘉道: “ 随你去嘘.

sentences.en: A steady hiss denoted that the oxygen was on.
sentences.cn: 一阵嘶嘶的声音说明氧气正在放出.

sentences.en: Geese and snakes hiss.
sentences.cn: 鹅和蛇发嘶嘶声.

sentences.en: He intends only his own security, only hiss own gain.
sentences.cn: 他关心的仅是自己的安全 、 自己的利益.

sentences.en: Hepatic insulin sensitizing substance ( HISS ), plays an important role in the pathogenesis of insulin resistance.
sentences.cn: 肝胰岛素敏感性物质 ( HISS ) 在胰岛素抵抗的发生机制中起重要作用.

sentences.en: His goal throughout the Hiss case was to obstruct our efforts to uncover the facts.
sentences.cn: 在整个希斯案件中,他的目的是阻碍我们揭露真相.

sentences.en: Hiss seemed genuinely uncertain and confused.
sentences.cn: 希斯看来已真的把握不定和心烦意乱了.

sentences.en: Hung - chien replied with a hiss.
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 的回答是:“Sh-sh-sh-shaw. ”

sentences.en: Men often applaud an imitation and hiss the real thing.
sentences.cn: 人经常为模仿品而喝彩对真品却咳之以鼻.

sentences.en: My cat hissed when I stepped on its tail.
sentences.cn: 我踩在了猫的尾巴上，于是它嘶嘶地叫了起来。

sentences.en: Snakes only hiss when they are afraid.
sentences.cn: 蛇只在恐惧时才发出声。

sentences.en: That hiss, faint as it was, irritated the irascible David.
sentences.cn: 那嘘声, 虽然很轻,却惹火了暴躁的戴维.

sentences.en: The cat backed away, hissing.
sentences.cn: 那只猫咝咝叫着退开了。

sentences.en: The one with the stomach trouble let out a hiss.
sentences.cn: 那害肚子的人报以一声“嘘”.

sentences.en: The original files are basically inaudible hiss. After increasing the volume substantially.
sentences.cn: 最初的文件基本上是听不嘘嘘声. 在充分调高音量后.

sentences.en: The performance was met with boos and hisses.
sentences.cn: 演出换来一片倒彩声和嘘声。

sentences.en: The snake gave a hiss.
sentences.cn: 蛇发出嘶嘶声.

sentences.en: the snake's hiss
sentences.cn: 蛇发出的嘶嘶声

sentences.en: The steam escaped with a loud hissing noise.
sentences.cn: 蒸汽大声地嘶嘶冒了出来。

sentences.en: The tyres of Lenny's bike hissed over the wet pavement as he slowed down.
sentences.cn: 兰尼减速时，他自行车的两个轮胎在潮湿的路面上发出嘶嘶声。

sentences.en: We can hear the hiss of air escaping from a tire.
sentences.cn: 我们能听到一只轮胎的嘶嘶漏气声.

words.tran_cn: 发出嘘声；发嘶嘶声（hiss的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: a sound like a long ‘s ’; this sound used to show disapproval of sb
to make a noise which sounds like ‘ssss’
